name: DemonCringe
description:
P.S. I apologize in advance for the poor quality translation into English

We lost a day and a half of work because of this we did not have time to do dialogues and some other things... 

Sorry

The story we wanted to tell:

The demon Cringe penetrates the hearts of people, constantly reminding them of the most shameful acts. Help the guy and the girl confess to each other by destroying the demon

Gameplay: 

Shoot hearts at people penetrating into their hearts. Destroy the demon with your power of love. 

Control:

Move: wasd

Shoot: space
